pages.text: Beacons are curious things. They give powerful effects across a large area, which is useful, but I can improve it. By putting a lens constructed from purified souls, soulium glass, and a bit of tartarite on top of the beacon, I can recieve its effect no matter where I am.
I should note that the lens will only provide the effect to the one who placed it, and that the lens must be 'chunkloaded', whatever that means.
